name: Classroom Descent
description:
A first person horror survival shooter. Fall into hell and battle endless hordes of the undead. How many waves can you survive?

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Mouse - Look Around

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Be sure to check out my android mobile games. Links can be found at:

http://tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/
